0.title: The Jehovah's Witnesses

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

0.plot: Former Jehovah's Witnesses share their stories of tragedy and loss. They discuss family members dying from refusing blood transfusions, disfellowship, suicide and more.

1.title: Emotional Aftermath

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: How does it feel to lose your entire belief system? How does it feel to come to believe everything you've been told--the foundation of who you are isn't based in truth? How do you let go of the anger?

2.title: Star Witness

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Gold Base, the heavily guarded Scientology compound in Riverside Count, California, houses up to 1,000 members of the church's elite inner core. Valerie Haney tells how the conditions at the base led her to contemplate suicide.

3.title: Spies Like Us

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Leah and Mike discuss the practice of Fair Game through their interview with Pat Broeker, an inventor whose personal life and reputation were ruined by Scientology not to mention the destruction of his life saving invention.

4.title: Unlikely Pairing

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Leah and Mike explore the new symbiosis between the Nation of Islam and Scientology.

5.title: Where Is Shelly?

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Leah and Mike interview Shelly's childhood friend Janis Gillham Grady and together they attempt to explain the mysterious disappearance of the First Lady of Scientology.

6.title: Ideal Orgs

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Leah and Mike interview Paul Burkhart, a former Ideal Org architect, and Bert Schippers, a former Scientologist who was a major Ideal Org donor.

7.title: The Collection Agency

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Gilman Springs Road

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: In a remote corner of Riverside County, Calif., lies Scientology's International Base, a compound that houses the church's most dedicated members. In this episode, Leah Remini and Mike Rinder, a former occupant of International Base ("Gold Base"), speak with four other former high-ranking residents who reveal their shocking stories behind the locked gates.

9.title: Buying a Town

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: In 1974, operating under an alias, the Church of Scientology moved into Clearwater, Florida, and proceeded to make the city its spiritual headquarters. In 1977, an FBI raid uncovered the Church's secret plans to take over the city.

10.title: Buying a Town Part 2

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: While visiting the headquarters of the Church of Scientology in Clearwater, Fla Leah and Mike are getting unwanted attention from Scientologists as well as law enforcement.

11.title: Church and State

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Leah and Mike speak with Jay Wexler, an expert in constitutional law, to discuss the remarkable story of Scientology's journey to tax-exempt status. Mike and Leah also talk with Lt. Yulanda Williams, a police officer, about law enforcement's community engagement strategies.

0.title: Ask Me Anything

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

0.plot: Along with Mike Rinder and other former Church members, Leah Remini answers questions about Scientology from her Reddit Ask Me Anything event forum submitted the day her new series debuted.

1.title: Disconnection

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Actress and ex-Scientologist Leah Remini meets with former Church of Scientology executive Amy Scobee, who shares her story of disconnection with her mother.

2.title: Fair Game

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Leah visits the spiritual headquarters of Scientology--Clearwater, Florida--to hear Mike Rinder's personal story.

3.title: The Bridge

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: After ascending to high levels of spiritually in the Church of Scientology, a woman pays a steep price for the experience.

4.title: A Leader Emerges

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: David Miscavige emerged as the leader of the Church of Scientology after the death of founder L. Ron Hubbard. Three former longtime church members, including David's father, share stories about what the church is like under his leadership.

5.title: Golden Era

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Marc Headley, former event producer at Golden Era, Scientology's production company, reveals truth about promotional media and gala fundraisers organized by the Church and how his disillusionment lead him and his wife to leave the Church.

6.title: Auditing

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Twin brothers and auditing prodigies find their paths diverging when one gets dismissed from the program, leading to a painful tragedy.

7.title: Enemies of the Church

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: After Leah receives a letter from the church accusing her of provoking hate crimes, she meets with a young man whom the church says she incited. Leah also sits down with journalists who have been hounded by the church for their reporting.

8.title: Ask Me Anything, Part 2

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: In this special episode, Leah and Mike Rinder answer more viewer questions from her Reddit Ask Me Anything forum. They are joined by special guests author Lawrence Wright, lawyer Ray Jeffrey, and mental health and cult expert Steve Hassan.

9.title: Merchants of Fear

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Leah Remini and Mike Rinder explore the historical relationship between the Church of Scientology and its often vocal critics. A series of special guests candidly describe their personal experiences investigating controversial stories about the Church and how the Church has responded to their work.

1.title: Thetans in Young Bodies

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Mike and Leah visit another ex-Scientologist and hear another horror story. Meanwhile, off-camera, David Miscavige is furious that he couldn't block the second season, and adds another Leah Remini attack website to the internet.

2.title: The Ultimate Failure of Scientology

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Scientology promises relief from all of life's ills, but those suffering from depression and suicidal ideation often feel they have nowhere to turn. Hearing the tragic stories of Aaron Poulin, a member of the Sea Org who committed suicide at 21, and Tayler Tweed, who died at only 19, only strengthen Leah's commitment to continue challenging Church practices.

3.title: The "Perfect" Scientology Family

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Liz Gale, a third generation Scientologist, was raised to believe that Scientology had the equation to create the perfect family.

4.title: The Bridge to Total Freedom

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Leah leads a round table discussion on The Bridge to Total Freedom and why scientologists spend so much money and time trying to achieve this coveted position.

5.title: The Rise of David Miscavige

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: David Miscavige remains the untouchable head of the Church of Scientology despite abuse allegations spanning decades. Former Miscavige associates detail how he manipulated his way into power.

6.title: Scientology and Celebrity: The Betrayal of Paul Haggis

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Since its inception, scieontology has been obsessed with recruiting celebrities. Leah and Mike sit down and talk with former scientologist and award winning filmmaker, Paul Haggis.

7.title: The Ranches

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: The Mace-Kingsley Ranches were promoted by Scientologists as educational camps for troubled kids, but former students say they were actually hard labor camps for children, with corporal punishment and challenging living conditions.

8.title: The Greatest Good

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Nothing is considered more important than clearing the planet. Leah and Mike visit with Mimi Faust and Christi Gordon, who share their harrowing stories of neglect and abandonment, having both paid the highest price for "The Greatest Good."

9.title: The Business of Religion

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: A round-table discussion examines the contracts that all Scientologists must follow and the financial burdens that these contracts can cause.

10.title: Lifetime of Healing

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Leah and Mike sit down with two of Leahs' childhoodhood friends.

11.title: Aftermath of the Aftermath

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Leah and Mike catch up with some previous guests on their show to chat about the impact of appearing on the show.

12.title: Propaganda Arms

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: In an effort to foster a positive public image, The Church of Scientology has funded groups whose purpose is to manufacture a positive perception in the public eye.

13.title: The Life & Lies of L. Ron Hubbard

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: Leah and Mike lead a round-table discussion about the life of L. Ron Hubbard and the provable lies that he told about his life.

14.title: Ask Me Anything Season 2

episode of.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath (TV Series 2016– )

14.plot: Leah answers viewers' questions about the second season of her show.

imdb.plot outline: A series featuring stories from former members of the Church of Scientology whose lives have been affected by the Church's harmful practices. Along with a team of former high-ranking Scientology insiders who understand the inner workings and policies of the organization, Leah gives the victims a chance to be heard.
imdb.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath
plot: A series featuring stories from former members of the Church of Scientology whose lives have been affected by the Church's harmful practices.

A series featuring stories from former members of the Church of Scientology whose lives have been affected by the Church's harmful practices. Along with a team of former high-ranking Scientology insiders who understand the inner workings and policies of the organization, Leah gives the victims a chance to be heard.

In this hourlong docuseries, actress 'Leah Remini' (qv) turns investigative reporter, she says, to "share the shocking truth about Scientology," the secretive, controversial church that Remini herself was a member of for years. With her personal experience acting as a driving force, Remini -- along with high-level former Scientology executives and members -- relates shocking stories of abuse and harassment alleged by ex-practitioners who claim their lives have been affected even well after they left the organization. The Church of Scientology, which has made multiple attempts to have A&E Network pull the series, refers to Remini as a "has-been actress" who's exploiting her former religion to make money.::Jwelch5742
